problem.markdown: >>What is the least whole number x for which 2 x > 11 ?<< = 6 [explanation] 11 divided by two is 5.5, rounding up gives you the next whole number that is greater than 11 when multipled by 2.
problem.p: What is the least whole number x for which 2 x > 11 ?

formulaequationinput.label: What is the least whole number x for which 2 x > 11 ?

problem.p: 11 divided by two is 5.5, rounding up gives you the next whole number that is greater than 11 when multipled by 2.
